resources.string: A modern programming language that makes developers happier.
Modern, concise, safe, expressive, interoperable and multiplatform. Easy to pick up, so you can create powerful applications immediately.
Download IntelliJ IDEA software for free or visit the playground at play.kotlinlang.org
Get familiar with the main function and run the most basic kotlin program.
Get to know println and readln functions.
Learn about comments, naming variables and some coding style conventions.
Variables in Kotlin can be immutable (val) and mutable (var).
Most important data types are Int, Double, String and Boolean, but there are more.
In Kotlin we can work with nullable types and non-nullable types for null safety.
Kotlin allows us to cast almost all types with a few exceptions.
Kotlin provides a more convenient way of working with ranges of values: val range = 0..10
In Kotlin you may concatenate two strings by having the variable value inside the quotes: \"$firstName $lastName\"
You should learn all mathematical and boolean operators.
This data structure is fundamental. It allows you to collect items of the same type, allowing duplicates and having a unique position.
Kotlin also provides the set, the map, and the array data structure.
Learn how to declare and invoke functions. Also learn about default and named arguments.
Kotlin provides the if/when expressions and the for/while loops.
Exceptions are run time errors that crashes the program execution if not properly handled.
Kotlin provides a way to work with functions as if they were objects.
Learn about classes, member functions and constructors.
Explore the power of inheritance, encapsulation, polymorphism, and data abstraction.
Get to know the extension functions and properties which are really powerful.
For classes that hold only data, for constants and for complex objects.
Kotlin provides easy access to singletons trough objects and companion objects.
These cannot be instantiated bur rather define the rules for future implementation.
Kotlin supports generic programming. It allows writing more abstract and reusable code.
The Random and the Math libraries are essential.
Learn about file hierarchies, reading from a file and writing to a file.
Please complete one of the projects here: hyperskill.org/tracks/18/projects
See more or less information about a tip.
